channel.title: CVE Feed for alsa-driver -- all

item.title: CVE-2009-0035|2024-08-07T04:17:10.368Z -- alsa-driver -- alsa-driver
item.description: alsa-utils 1.0.19 and later versions allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack via the /usr/bin/alsa-info and /usr/bin/alsa-info.sh scripts.
